001package io.github.ai4ci;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.nio.file.Paths;
008
009import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
010import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLineParser;
011import org.apache.commons.cli.Converter;
012import org.apache.commons.cli.DefaultParser;
013import org.apache.commons.cli.HelpFormatter;
014import org.apache.commons.cli.Option;
015import org.apache.commons.cli.Options;
016import org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException;
017import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
018import org.apache.logging.log4j.Level;
019
020import io.github.ai4ci.config.ExperimentConfiguration;
021import io.github.ai4ci.flow.SimulationMonitor;
022
023/**
024 * Command-line entry for the simulator and a small launcher used by batch
025 * systems.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * This class exposes a simple CLI for running experiments. Options accepted by
029 * the main method are:
030 *
031 * <ul>
032 * <li><b>-o, --output &lt;output&gt;</b> — Path to the output directory.
033 * Defaults to the current working directory. A leading <code>~</code> is
034 * expanded to the invoking user's home directory.</li>
035 * <li><b>-c, --config &lt;config&gt;</b> — Path to the configuration JSON file.
036 * By default the launcher looks for <code>config.json</code> in the output
037 * directory.</li>
038 * </ul>
039 *
040 * Behaviour notes:
041 * <ul>
042 * <li>If the output directory does not exist it will be created (or a
043 * RuntimeException is raised if creation fails).</li>
044 * <li>If the configuration file cannot be found a RuntimeException is
045 * raised.</li>
046 * <li>On CLI parse errors the program prints usage help and exits (status 0) —
047 * see the printed help for SLURM usage hints.</li>
048 * </ul>
049 *
050 * <p>
051 * The launcher integrates with SLURM workflows by accepting continuous batch
052 * array parameters; see the usage help printed by the program for an example
053 * invocation. For programmatic callers use {@link SimulationMonitor} and
054 * {@link ExperimentConfiguration#readConfig(Path)} directly.
055 */
056public class JPanSim2 {
057
058        private static Path expand(Path path) {
059                if (path.startsWith("~" + File.separator)) {
060                        path = Paths.get(
061                                        System.getProperty("user.home"), path.toString().substring(1)
062                        );
063                }
064                return path;
065        }
066
067        /**
068         * The main entry point for a command line or SLURM batch job.
069         *
070         * @throws InterruptedException if the simulation is interrupted by the user
071         *                              or a batch system signal. The simulation will
072         *                              attempt to save progress before exiting when
073         *                              interrupted.
074         * @throws IOException          if the output directory cannot be created or
075         *                              the configuration file cannot be read.
076         * @param args the command line arguments; see the class-level Javadoc for
077         *             accepted options and usage notes.
078         */
079        public static void main(String... args)
080                        throws IOException, InterruptedException {
081
082                var dir = SystemUtils.getUserDir().toPath();
083                var configFile = dir.resolve("config.json");
084
085                // define options via CLI
086                var options = new Options();
087
088                var outputPath = Option.builder("o").longOpt("output").argName(
089                                "output"
090                ).hasArg(true).converter(Converter.PATH).desc(
091                                "The path to the output directory. Defaults to the current working directory."
092                ).required(false).build();
093
094                var configPath = Option.builder("c").longOpt("config").argName(
095                                "config"
096                ).hasArg(true).converter(Converter.PATH).desc(
097                                "The path to the configuration file. Defaults to \"config.json\" in the output directory."
098                ).required(false).build();
099
100                options.addOption(outputPath);
101                options.addOption(configPath);
102                // define parser
103                CommandLine cmd;
104                CommandLineParser parser = new DefaultParser();
105                var helper = new HelpFormatter();
106
107                try {
108                        cmd = parser.parse(options, args);
109
110                        if (cmd.hasOption(outputPath)) {
111                                var tmp = expand(cmd.getParsedOptionValue(outputPath));
112                                dir = tmp;
113                        }
114
115                        if (cmd.hasOption(configPath)) {
116                                var tmp = expand(cmd.getParsedOptionValue(configPath));
117                                configFile = tmp;
118                        }
119
120                } catch (ParseException e) {
121                        System.out.println(e.getMessage());
122                        helper.printHelp(
123                                        "Usage:", "JPanSim2 command line options.", options,
124                                        "Slurm support: batch commands must be continuous and start at 1\n"
125                                                        + "e.g. sbatch --array=1-32"
126                        );
127                        System.exit(0);
128                }
129                // finish configuration using CLI
130
131                try {
132                        Files.createDirectories(dir);
133                } catch (IOException e) {
134                        throw new RuntimeException(
135                                        "Could not create output directory at: " + dir
136                        );
137                }
138
139                if (!Files.exists(configFile)) throw new RuntimeException(
140                                "Could not find configuration at: " + configFile
141                );
142
143                var conf = ExperimentConfiguration.readConfig(configFile);
144
145                // Common SLURM options
146                SlurmAwareLogger.setupLogger(conf, dir, Level.INFO, Level.DEBUG);
147                var runner = new SimulationMonitor(conf, dir);
148                runner.run();
149
150        }
151
152}
